shinhuade.name: Shin Hua De Enterprise Co., Ltd.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.subtitle: Hi! I'm Xuan
intro.desc1: Specializing in React interactive development, I am dedicated to transforming design and logic into intuitive, seamless products.
intro.desc2: From the finest UI details and the rhythm of interactions to the overall architecture, I strive for more than just 'functionality'—I aim for 'comfort.' To me, frontend development is more than writing code; it’s about bridging the gap between people and technology, making every digital experience feel closer and more human.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.subtitle: Let’s work together to transform your ideas into digital experiences with a human touch.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: From web to app, breathing life into every interface.

intro.title: Hi! I'm Xuan Lin.
intro.desc1: For me, front-end development is where technology meets humanity.
intro.desc2: Code isn't just cold instructions; it's the bridge connecting users. Rather than blindly chasing new technologies, I focus on creating 'intuition'—making technology invisible and experiences memorable.
intro.desc3: I approach projects holistically, focusing on every transformation from backend logic to frontend details. Regardless of the device, my goal remains constant: to build smooth, refined, and warm digital products that bridge the gap between users and the digital world.

history.degree: Master of Chemical and Materials Engineering
Bachelor of Chemical and Materials Engineering

jobs.desc: Focused on precision chemical processes and high-quality dye purification, cultivating rigor for details and system stability.

list.title: Precision Process & Quality Management
list.content: Led high-quality dye purification procedures, established high-standard SOPs, ensuring product and system stability.

list.title: Membrane Filtration System
list.content: Precisely controlled process parameters, ensuring product purity met standards through data monitoring, significantly improving filtration efficiency.

list.title: Data-Driven Decision Making
list.content: Analyzed process data for anomaly diagnosis, establishing systematic logic to prevent potential deviations and ensure continuous production line operation.

jobs.desc: Responsible for developing a Japanese e-commerce platform, optimizing system stability and enhancing the cross-border shopping experience.

list.title: Systematic Interface Construction
list.content: Built a modular component library and standardized development guidelines, increasing code reusability by 40% and ensuring high visual consistency across functional modules.

list.title: Cross-Device UI/UX Optimization
list.content: Implemented responsive web design, resolving cross-device visual discrepancies and enhancing interface usability and aesthetics.

list.title: Shopping Flow & State Management
list.content: Developed a high-performance shopping cart system and complex state management logic, reducing checkout drop-off rates and effectively increasing platform conversion rates by improved interaction feedback and error handling.

jobs.desc: Responsible for developing and maintaining Web platforms and cross-platform Apps (iOS/Android), ensuring consistency in multi-terminal user experiences.

list.title: Cross-Platform Dev & Architecture Optimization
list.content: Utilized React technology to abstract business logic between Web and App, saving development time.

list.title: API Integration & Data Processing
list.content: Integrated asynchronous APIs and data import, ensuring seamless connection between frontend and backend logic.

list.title: High Componentization
list.content: Developed company internal component library based on Ant Design, improving team UI development efficiency and maintaining visual unity.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: My creative collection, documenting my growth in design and development.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Thank you for visiting my personal website. This policy explains how we handle personal data collected via the contact form.

collection.title: 1. Data We Collect
collection.prefix: When you fill out and submit the contact form on this site, we collect your

usage.title: 2. Purpose of Use
usage.content: The collected information is used solely to respond to your inquiry or interview requests. I will not use your data for marketing or sell it to third parties.

thirdparty.title: 3. Third-party Services
thirdparty.suffix: to send emails. Your data is transmitted securely via encryption.

rights.title: 4. Your Rights
rights.content: You may contact me at any time to request access, correction, or deletion of your communication records.
